Hello Everyone(Again, 2 announcements in one night lolz)
People have seem to have been complaining, alot, about players mics.
First of all, we have NO RESTRICTIONS ON MIC USAGE, other than no spamming, advertising, and playing music/voice changers.
Second of all, we will NEVER have restrictions on mic usage(age, voice, ect.)
Please stop asking for us to add those restrictions.
I can assure you that they will NEVER be added.
In addition, discrimination due to age or voice is NOT ALLOWED.
If it is reported or witnessed, you WILL BE BANNED. There are no exceptions.
If you have any questions, feel free to post in the Jail or Flood sections.
